job_history.work_description: Processed and verified all incoming checks inputting the client information into the system. Prepared invoices for recording, process all account receivable and deposit cash receipts. Maintained records of the debits and credits and update the system. Audited financial reports for accurate recording and process. Provide daily report for to ensure proper debits and credits are applied. Reconcile account booking saving over $1,000 from errors and omission from customers on outstanding invoices. Communicated with manager and other team member to resolve outstanding issues.

Researched, analyzed, and resolved a wide range of treasury, cash management and or depository products and service for Global Large Corporate accounts. Provided a depth knowledge of Account Reconcilement, Cash Vault services, deposit demand accounts, Electronic File Transmission, Cash Pro online usage, Automated Clearing House payments Wire Services and various treasury products and services Provided independent account management, client servicing and implementation coordination of new services for highly complex accounts. Identified opportunities to initiate client collaboration in the development of product services including recommending new products to clients. Displayed excellent client service skills while building and sustaining a client portfolio of over $56MM in revenue.

Assisted and managed a team geared to retrieve checks from Image ATM and organize the daily Workflow. Responsible for debiting/crediting customer's general ledger accounts, with minimal impact to the Bank and clients. Established and maintained regular management routines to identify and communicate key priorities with stakeholders. Effectively influences clients to prioritize reporting efforts and follow best practices. Established and maintained effective filing system to identify and communicate system production issues to include resolution or escalation to reduce customer impacts.

Prepared incoming cash from customers, counting and strapping it with the help of a cash counting machine. Executed all aspects of system hardware operations that required the input of large quantities of cash into the machine. Resulting in minimal impact to clients. Prepared cash out or cash in ticket to adjust out of balance issues.

Executed all aspects of customer service incoming call center including inquiries, billing and activation of cellular service. Answered telephone for service questions for customer support, document the client needs.

Managed a team of experts that executed all aspects of system hardware installs and repairs regarding check 21 Sorter Operations. Resulting in 40% increase to Bank of America and its clients and a quick turnaround on all Service Level Agreements. Acted as subject matter expert relative to designing, documenting, implementing, monitoring and identifying qualitative improvement opportunities in Bank of America.

education.domain: Compliance training for Anti-Money Laundering, timekeeping, and other bank and federal regulation

skills.name: Account Reconciliation
skills.explanation: Extensive experience in account reconciliation, including identifying and resolving errors and omissions, and reconciling account bookings to save over $1,000.

skills.name: Cash Management
skills.explanation: Significant experience in cash management, including processing and verifying incoming checks, preparing invoices, and maintaining records of debits and credits.

skills.name: Customer Service
skills.explanation: Proven track record of providing excellent customer service, including resolving customer inquiries, and building and sustaining a client portfolio of over $56MM in revenue.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Experience in leading teams, including managing a team of experts in check 21 Sorter Operations, and assisting and managing a team in daily workflow operations.

skills.name: Financial Analysis
skills.explanation: Some experience in financial analysis, including auditing financial reports for accurate recording and processing.

skills.name: Time Management
skills.explanation: Experience in managing time effectively, including establishing and maintaining regular management routines to identify and communicate key priorities with stakeholders.

skills.name: Compliance
skills.explanation: Some knowledge of compliance, including training in Anti-Money Laundering, timekeeping, and other bank and federal regulations.

skills.name: Project Management
skills.explanation: Some experience in project management, including implementing and coordinating new services for complex accounts.
